txt.en: Half-orcs and ruffians can be found at Sharkey's Slough in the Gladden Fields.\n\nHalf-orcs and ruffians loyal to Sharkey have begun to use dredging machines Saruman long ago abandoned on the Gladden Fields to begin a new search.
You have defeated many half-orcs and ruffians at Sharkey's Slough.
A band of half-orcs and ruffians loyal to one called Sharkey has begun to dredge the Gladden Fields with equipment left behind from Saruman's failed search for the Ring.
You have defeated many of the half-orcs and ruffians at Sharkey's Slough. While it seems Sharkey has no shortage of followers, you have done much to disrupt his efforts in the Gladden Fields.
Defeated half-orcs and ruffians at Sharkey's Slough ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

After discovering the terrible destruction done to the Gladden Fields, Radagast is determined to halt the work of the band of ruffians loyal to Sharkey. You should defeat as many half-orcs and ruffians as you can at Sharkey's Slough.
Defeat half-orcs and ruffians at Sharkey's Slough ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
